analysis.description:
MamaToken.fallback (/unique_chucks/31/0x1e66f8bf4e95d61cfac0f98d9d6c0ffa23e360e5.sol#153-159) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= openingTime && block.timestamp <= closingTime) (/unique_chucks/31/0x1e66f8bf4e95d61cfac0f98d9d6c0ffa23e360e5.sol#156-158)

MamaToken._rate should be constant (/unique_chucks/31/0x1e66f8bf4e95d61cfac0f98d9d6c0ffa23e360e5.sol#69-70)
MamaToken.closingTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/31/0x1e66f8bf4e95d61cfac0f98d9d6c0ffa23e360e5.sol#81-82)
MamaToken.openingTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/31/0x1e66f8bf4e95d61cfac0f98d9d6c0ffa23e360e5.sol#79)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/31/0x1e66f8bf4e95d61cfac0f98d9d6c0ffa23e360e5.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_chucks/31/0x1e66f8bf4e95d61cfac0f98d9d6c0ffa23e360e5.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/31/0x1e66f8bf4e95d61cfac0f98d9d6c0ffa23e360e5.sol#54-55) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of MamaToken.burn (/unique_chucks/31/0x1e66f8bf4e95d61cfac0f98d9d6c0ffa23e360e5.sol#89-91) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of MamaToken.mint (/unique_chucks/31/0x1e66f8bf4e95d61cfac0f98d9d6c0ffa23e360e5.sol#98) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of MamaToken.mint (/unique_chucks/31/0x1e66f8bf4e95d61cfac0f98d9d6c0ffa23e360e5.sol#98) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_weiAmount' of MamaToken.forwardFunds (/unique_chucks/31/0x1e66f8bf4e95d61cfac0f98d9d6c0ffa23e360e5.sol#182-183) is not in mixedCase
